item.title: Is Free EdgeOne Really That Good?
item.description: Recently, while migrating my blog to Hugo, I discovered that Tencent Cloud’s EdgeOne (hereinafter referred to as EO) domestic version had also been launched, and they’re running a promotion. I scanned the lottery QR code and immediately won long-term free access to EO. Looking at it, it’s similar to Cloudflare’s (hereinafter referred to as CF) free CDN - unlimited traffic, but many advanced features are removed (like the Header-based CacheKey customization I wanted most), plus there’s the Pages service currently in public beta (supposedly will be free forever)

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description:
This article introduces commonly used Markdown syntax.

Headings

Use # to create headings, the number indicates the level.

Text Styles

  • Strikethrough

Links and Images

Code

Inline code: const x = 1;

 print("Hello, World!")
